title: Injection Gauntlet
description: Exploit SQL and Command Injection vulnerabilities to capture the flag.
hints: Looks like this login form doesn't properly sanitize its inputs.
SQLmap might come in handy here.
After bypassing login, is there another command you can run? Netcat could help.
learningObjectives: Understand and exploit SQL Injection vulnerabilities
Understand and exploit Command Injection vulnerabilities
Learn to use tools like SQLmap and Netcat
